sections.heading: Garnishee; answer; interrogatories; filing fee; costs
sections.text: The garnishee shall answer, under oath, all the interrogatories put to him touching the property of every description and credits of the defendant in his possession or under his control at the time of the service of the summons and interrogatorie

sections.heading: to all garnishment proceedings; unless fees are tendered, garnishee need not appear
sections.text: Chicago, B. & Q. R. R. Co. v. Van Cleave, 52 Neb. 67, 71 N.W. 971 (1897).
